meanings.sent1: The brazening squirrel stole nuts from right under our noses.
meanings.sent2: Her brazening behavior at the party shocked everyone.
meanings.sent3: The brazening cat walked into the dog's territory without a care.
meanings.sent4: The brazening crow strutted around the park as if it owned the place.
meanings.sent5: His brazening attitude towards authority often got him into trouble.

meanings.definition: To face or undergo with bold self-assurance
meanings.sent1: She was brazening the storm, refusing to seek shelter.
meanings.sent2: He brazened the difficult exam without studying.
meanings.sent3: The little boy brazened the haunted house, pretending not to be scared.
meanings.sent4: The explorer brazened the uncharted territory, eager for adventure.
meanings.sent5: They brazened the challenge, determined to succeed against all odds.
